column5: Nice report. Thanks for sharing.

Super report, looks like you had a great time.  I know about the weather, had to kind of fish in between storms.   At least it was only really hot the first day like us!!!  Some really nice fish there.   Cool bowfin
wonderful report, looks like you had a nice trip! That is some cover there, so thick! thanks for sharing
Good going Mike,great pictures and love the bait cast collection!!!!!!!!!!!
Bass after bass after bass. That 5lber is a true hog! I can't believe how much slop cover is on that lake.
Great report Mike, those are some awesome Bass!!! Thanks for sharing...  Maureen

It's a combo of 3 different small lakes all connected and the channels between them. Eastern Ontario around and past Kingston is the place to fish, after fishing these lakes I would rather a few nice trips over a dozen weekend trips close to home  Going back for 3 days in September, never fished that time of year there, Frog's might not come out who knows. Excited to try!

Nice collection of bass you guys got into ! and that is def some interesting water by the rock, very thick soup.  gotta ask, that's a great screen shelter you've got set up, who makes it ? I'm looking for something to stifle next year's batch of deer flies
Good report there bud, with some beautiful pics, and yes that last pic was spectacular .... looks like you had a ton of fun.  Good on ya'
You guys are groovin.  Way to go.  Looks like you guys grabbed some nice hogs out of some nice water.
Nice report and nickel Mike! Slop fishing is tons of fun...  Pete
Great report and some nice bass. That's some wicked looking slop you were fishing!
Great pictures and report Mike.... thanks
Great report and pics.  Some sweet looking Buckets!
Great stuff Mike.  Some excellent fish, pics and enjoyed the bowfin and recap.  Thanks fella!
Nicely done Mike! Your work desk has so many things that I'd like to have! lol
Nice report man.. you guys looks like you had a blast!
Thanks Mike. I think I hate that your dad looks younger then me though.
Looks like you sheaded some pounds there Mike.  Love the waters your fishing.  Thanks for taking the time to share.
Aboslute beauts u got there.. I need to get out more, but the new trailer I got in the spring, and the yard around the house has me tied up pretty tight
Some quality fish there Mike. Good job.
Great report.  Looks like you had a good time.
